name: All You Can Feed: Sushi Bar
description: All You Can Feed: Sushi Bar let's you handle your own Sushi place. Create Maki, Nigiri or Futomaki, served with Green Tea, Soy Sauce and Wasabi to satisfy to your customers. Can you handle your own Sushi Bar or will you drown in orders?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: SSE2 Support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8500 GT or Radeon HD 2400 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: -
